column1: 6.2.2.5 Guidelines for the treatment of intermediate-risk disease*

Offer RP to patients with cN0 disease as part of multi-modal therapy. 
Weak

Offer IMRT/VMAT plus IGRT to the prostate in combination with long-term ADT and 
2 years of abiraterone to cN0M0 patients with > 2 high-risk factors (cT3-4, Gleason 
> 8 or PSA > 40 ng/mL).

Offer IMRT/VMAT plus IGRT to the prostate plus pelvis in combination with  
long-term ADT and 2 years of abiraterone to cN1M0 patients.

Offer patients with cN1 disease a local treatment (either RP or IMRT/VMAT plus 
IGRT) plus long-term ADT.
